originalText.text: Dr. Pober did my nose/rhinoplasty on 05/08/22 and it changed my life and career. After I did my nose it gave me more confidence and even improved my performance at work. The surgery was quick and so was recovery with no scars

originalText.text: Dr. Pober gave me my confidence back 21 years ago after my ex husband said I did not age well. Well I am 61 years old now and having nothing but confidence in having Dr. Pober make me look 15 years or more younger. That is the goal. I have complete trust in Dr. Pober.

text.text: Dr. Pober gave me my confidence back 21 years ago after my ex husband said I did not age well. Well I am 61 years old now and having nothing but confidence in having Dr. Pober make me look 15 years or more younger. That is the goal. I have complete trust in Dr. Pober.

originalText.text: I had a facelift and Rhinoplasty with Dr Pober 6 months ago and I am beyond thrilled with the results of both procedures.  Dr. Pober is a Harvard educated Board Certified Plastic Surgeon , an Artist, and one of the kindest and most sympathetic surgeons I have ever met, and he Loves what he does.  He explained the procedures to me in depth , told me exactly what the outcome would be, which was truly the result,  exactly as he promised . There was little to no pain with both procedures and practically no downtime at all. Dr Pober made me look at least 15 years younger and it’s very natural, he is an exceptional surgeon. As far as I’m concerned he is the BEST at what he does  and he does it with compassion and a smile.

originalText.text: I went to Dr. Pober many years ago.  I was very anxious to get my nose done . I should not have been so anxious  and looked into him further. It was one of the worst experiences of my life. If your first  timers you’re not familiar with plastic surgery, you trust the doctor why wouldn’t you, he’s a doctor but little do we forget it’s all about the money. Dr. Pober recommended not only my nose being done but did my lips and chin also. Knowing now what I should have then I was over charged and diasappointed. It took over 1 and 1/2  years just for the racoon  eyes to heal and my nose . I had a dent in my nose and it drooped by the nostrils. My lips never took and he repeated the procedure. But still no luck My chin never looked touched. Dr. Pobers  office was always crowded, overbooked  and took hours to see him. My surgery was even late. Let’s not mention during the wait in the office many were unsatified clients. His own staff member was told to lie to the clients. Dr. Prober is highly overrated, overpriced and should be banned from using a scalpel. Don’t do it to yourself. Find someone else.

originalText.text: I am a repeat patient of Dr. Pober.  I have been pleased with both his decorum and expertise.   I am equally pleased with the results from the procedures that I have had.  As long as he continues to provide quality results and safety, I will continue to be a client.
